en: Iran is experiencing another internet blackout; after 4 days, reports state over 12,000 dead and many injured, with the regime using the shutdown to hide violence.
Following 4 days of internet blackout in Iran, reports show over 12,000 killed and numerous injured as the regime and IRGC suppress information, urging global intervention.
After 4 days of blackout, Iran reports more than 12,000 deaths and many injuries, with the Islamic regime and IRGC using the shutdown to mask violence and calls for action.
